column4: Still looking for a way to find out if my computer A. Has a Wireless NIC, B. Just refuses to acknowledge its existance, C. Will be forced to run XP.
do a 'lspci' to list your pci devices.
yeah... that tells me that I have no wireless. but so does iwconfig, ifconfig -a, and lshw. starting to doubt there's one in here.
Sounds like a hardware problem of some kinda.... is it possible to try the card in a different pci slot?
OR the card in another system?
